title: Workers' Compensation Liability for COVID-19 Vaccine Side Effects May Be Limited
author: Allen Smith; J D
description: Employers may be liable for workers' compensation for employees who experience side effects from mandated COVID-19 vaccines, but that liability may be limited and shouldn't impede company policies requiring vaccination.
